review: Went for the first time found him good, he was listening patiently to my concern, more over i am happy i found him near my house.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was recommended surgery by some other doctor but Dr. Naresh Agarwal did the physical examination along with MRI and suggested bed rest and physiotherapy instead of surgery. He explained me everything in detail and the best part was his availability over phone to clear my queries. He is very friendly and quite approachable.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Naresh had checked very well and askeed evey before treatment details of Patient also. I think this was a good thing for a patient for his/her satisfaction. And He expained very well the dosage of medicines as he has given a printed details of the same......Thanks Dr. Naresh Aggarwal
